Matsakaicin cututtukan coronavirus (COVID-19) ya nuna ayyukan da ke da alaƙa a cikin ƙasashe na European Union/European Economic Area da ƙasar Burtaniya wanda ya tabbatar cewa, yayin da ake da alaƙa a cikin ƙasashe, cutar ta COVID-19 tana ci gaba cikin tsawon lokaci a duk ƙasashe.

A cikin Italiya, ƙasashe, asibitoci da wuraren kulawa mai zurfi suna daidaita ayyukansu don ƙarin ayyukan shirye-shirye don ƙarin masu cutarwa da COVID-19 waɗanda za su buƙata sabis na lafiya, da kuma ayyukan kulawa mai zurfi.

A ranar 9 ga Janairu, 2020, China Center for Disease Control and Prevention ya bayyana cutar da ke haifar da cutar a matsayin cutar corona ta farko wacce aka fi sani da severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
Duk da haka, cutar da aka samu daga kamuwa da cutar SARS-CoV-2 ta kasance suna coronavirus disease (COVID-19).
Shaida da yanzu cewa kusan 80% na mutanen da suka kamu da COVID-19 suna da cutar lafiya mai tsanani, i.e. matsala ta numfashi da ko da aikin nimoniya, kuma akwai yawan wannan suka dawo.
A cikin kashi 14% na cututtukan cututtuka, CoVID-19 ya zama cikakken cutar da ke buƙatar asibiti, yayin da sauran kashi 6% na cututtukan cututtuka suna buƙatar kulawa mai zurfi.
Mace-mace na mutanen da suka shiga asibiti saboda COVID-19 ita ce 4%.

A ranar 15 ga Maris 2020, cutar COVID-19 ta kasance a cikin duk 30 kasashen EU/EEA da Birtaniya (UK), inda tsakanin 31 Disamba 2019 da wannan ranar da aka bayar da rahoton 39,768 kamuwa da 1,727 mutuwa, tare da 17,750 kamuwa da 1,441 mutuwa daga Italiya kawai.
Gwajin adadin da adadin da aka samu na lokuta na COVID-19.

A cikin Kungiyar Kula da Kariya daga Cuta na Turai (ECDC), adadin masu kamu da cutar CoVID-19 a kowace ƙasa a duniya, wanda aka samu daga kawai sassan hukumomin gwamnati na ƙasashe, hukumar lafiya ta ƙasa da ƙasa da kuma Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya (WHO), ana saita kowace rana a 8:00 a.m.
An yi amfani da wannan bayanai don yin bayyana tarihin COVID-19 a EU/EEA da Birtaniya, da kuma yin kiyayewa da shi a Italiya.

A matsayin ɗaya daga cikin ƙimar yawan cututtukan COVID-19 masu aiki, muna ƙididdige 14-day truncated cumulative incidence na cututtukan COVID-19, don haka a ƙarƙashin alaƙa da tsarin rayuwa na COVID-19 a kowace ƙasa ta EU/EEA da Burtaniya, a cikin lokacin 1 ga Janairu - 15 ga Maris 2020.
Kuma muka gabatar da jimillar kwanakin da aka tabbatar da kowane ƙasa a ranar 15 ga Maris 2020 8:00 a.m. da kuma da Italiya don lokacin 31 ga Janairu - 15 ga Maris 2020.

Bayanan shigar da COVID-19 a cikin asibiti da kuma cikin ICU a yanzu ana samunsa a cikin EU/EEA don kawai 6% da 1% marasa lafiya, bi da bi (data ba a nuna ba).
Koyaya, za a iya tattara su ta hanyar tsari don tabbatar da bayanan da ake amfani da su a yanzu da suka shafi lambar karshe da lambar mutuwa.

A cikin shekarar 2010-11, an gudanar da bincike wanda ya nuna bambanta da yawa a cikin ayyukan asibiti da asibiti na tsakanin a Turai, daga 29.2 a cikin Jamus zuwa 4.2 cikin 100,000 al'umma a Portugal.
Wannan yana nufin cewa kasashen da suka hada da Italiya za su iya da yawa ko da yawa na kayayyaki fiye da Italiya (12.5 intensive care and intermediate care beds per 100,000 population in 2010–11).

Matsalolin da aka shirya don ayyukan lafiya, tare da kiyayewa don kowace ƙasa ta EU/EEA da Burtaniya na yawan cutar COVID-19 a cikin asibiti wanda ke cikin haɗarin > 90% na yin kama a cikin matsakaicin gado, ana ba da shawarwari a cikin saƙon biyu na ECDC rapid risk assessment na COVID-19.

Bayan haka, a cikin yankunan EU/EEA da kuma Birtaniya, kamuwa da cutar da yanzu suna raba a yankunan da ke cikin barkewar, da kuma asibitocin da sashin buƙatar tsananin kulawar kama gado suna aiki a cikin yankunan da aka bayyana, bayanai game da kamuwa da cutar da sashin buƙatar tsananin kulawar kama gado za a iya bayarwa a cikin Nomenclature of territorial units for statistics 2 (NUTS-2).
Bayanan da aka samu daga Italiya da bayanan da ke tattare da wasu ƙasashe sun nuna cewa cutar COVID-19 tana ci gaba da ci gaba a cikin EU/EEA da Burtaniya.

Ƙasashe, asibitoci da wuraren garkuwa da lafiya suna da alhakin shirya kansu don wani shiri na ci gaba da bazuwar jama'a na SARS-CoV-2 da ci gaban adadin masu cutar COVID-19 da ke buƙatar lafiya, kuma tare da sauran wuraren garkuwa da lafiya, kamar yadda ke faruwa a yankunan da ke cikin haɗarin Italiya.

Hutun lokacin bazara a ranar 25 ga Janairu, 2020, ya zama abin tunawa na farko da abin tunawa na karshe ga duk mutanen Sin waɗanda suka shirya za su zama a cikin gida don duk lokacin hutu da sauran rabi bayan haka sakamakon barkewar cutar da ke faruwa.

Kwayar cutar ita ce ta daidaita da coronavirus (CoV) wanda ya haifar da cutar hanyoyin numfashi mai tsanani (SARS) a shekara 2003; don haka aka sanya sunan SARS-CoV-2 ta Kungiyar Lafiya ta Duniya (WHO) a ranar 11 ga Fabrairu, 2020, da cutar da ke da alaƙa da ita ta sanya sunan CoV Disease-19 (COVID-19).
Annobar ya fara ne a wuhan, china, amma ya yadu cikin tsawon lokaci a duk kasar da sauran kasashe da dama a duniya.
Ya zuwa ga Maris 2, 2020, cutar ta haifar da kusan 80,000 lokuta masu tabbatar da COVID-19, tare da kusan 40,000 mutane da suka fitar da su da kuma kusan 3,000 mutane da suka mutu.
Kungiyar Lafiya ta yi bayani cewa COVID-19 shine "abokin cin nasara na 1" kuma yana da tasiri mai girma fiye da kisan kare.

Kamar yadda PubMed (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/), a cikin kwanaki 200 da suka gabata, sama da 200 rahotannin da aka buga kan COVID-19 ciki har da virology, epidemiology, etiology, diagnosis, da kuma ilmantarwa tun daga rahoton farko a ranar 7 ga Janairu 2020 da ya tsara jerin cutar da aka samu daga marasa lafiya da dama.
Wannan bincike ya yi ƙoƙari ya bayyana ci gaban binciken da aka yi a cikin yanki na farko da ke ci gaba da ci gaba.
Idan zai daidai, zamu iya karanta covid-19 tare da sars da cutar mers wacce ta fito a 2012.
Hakanan zamu yi magana game da abubuwan da muka samu har zuwa yanzu game da rigakafin da nuna cutarwa da kuma wasu tambayoyi masu zuwa da ake buƙata.
CoVs suna da alaƙa da ƙaƙƙarfan mutane, kuma suna haifar da kusan 15% na zazzabi.

Amma a wannan shekaru, muka yi fice da cututtukan corona na mutum biyu, i.e., SARS COV da MERS COV, wanda ya haifar da fashewar farko a kasar Sin a 2003 da Saudi Arabia a 2012, bi da bi, da kuma yaduwa zuwa kasashen daban-daban tare da cutarwa da mutuwa.
Saboda haka, cutar COVID-19 na yanzu ita ce ta uku a cikin cututtukan CoV a tarihin mutane.

An gano SARS-CoV-2 a matsayin nau'in beta-CoV na farko da kashi 99.98% na kamanceceniya a cikin 10 samfura da aka yi a cikin samfuran da aka samu daga wurin farko na yaduwar cutar, kasuwancin kayan ruwa na Huanan a Wuhan.

Asalin da ƙarƙashin ɗaya
An san cewa kwayar cutar SARS-CoV da MERS-CoV sun samo asali ne daga jemagu da suka watsa kai tsaye ga mutane ta hanyar civet da amale.

Ta yin bayyanar phylogenetic na SARS-CoV-2 da sauran CoVs, jemagu an yi imani da su ne masu asali na SARS-CoV-2 a matsayin cutar ta baya 96% daidai da biyu SARS-like CoVs daga jemagu da ake kira bat-SL-CoVZX45 da bat-SL-CoVZX21.
Kodayake, wani mai gudanarwa na tsakanin mai gudanarwa ya taimaka wa kwayar cutar ta kai tsakanin jinsi zuwa kamuwa da mutane ya kasance mai tsoro, da kuma hanyar watsa shirye-shirye ba a bayyana ba.
Ji, da sauransu, suka bayyana jangali a matsayin mai daidaita kwayar cutar daga jemagu zuwa mutane wanda ya shafi recombination a cikin S protein.

A cikin bincike, masu bincike a Guangzhou, China, sun bayyana cewa pangolins - jemagen da ke da hankali, jemagen da aka yi amfani da su a aikin siyayya na kasar Sin, sune masu haɗin gwiwa na ƙarshe na SARS-CoV-2 saboda 99% homology a cikin CoV da aka samu a cikin pangolins da SARS-CoV-2.
Duk da haka, ƙarin 1% ya ƙunshi duniyar duka biyun kwayoyin halitta; don haka, sakamakon da ke cikin ƙarshe don bayyana bayanai suna cikin ƙarshe (Alƙalawa. 33).
Siffofin cutar SARS-CoV-2 ba a san su ba.
SARS-CoV da MERS-CoV za su iya rayuwa a cikin vitro har zuwa awanni 48 a cikin yanayin sauri da kuma har tsawon kwanaki 5 a 20 °C da 40%-50% ruwa.
Kwayar cutar SARS-CoV-2 na iya dauke da kamani iri ɗaya.

An bayyana cewa SARS COV 2 yana da kyau ga ultraviolet rays da heat a 56 ° C don 30 mintuna; ether, 75% ethanol, chlorine-containing disinfectant, peracetic acid, chloroform, da sauransu, amma ba chlorhexidine ba, za su iya kawar da cutar.
Jama'ar duniya kai tsaye ba su da imuniti ga SARS-CoV-2 kuma don haka suna cikin yanayin da za su iya kamuwa da cutar.
A yanzu, ba a bayyana binciken daidai ba game da yanayin daidaita ga SARS-CoV-2.
Don haka, zamu iya kira ga binciken da aka yi kan cututtukan sauran CoVs, musamman SARS-CoV da MERS-CoV (Rana 4).

Cutar SARS-CoV-2, wanda aka bayyana a matsayin cutar da ke faruwa a cikin gaggawa, yana da alaƙa da mutanen masu shekaru da cututtuka masu zuwa da mata masu ciki.
Yana da yawa cewa don mutane da ke cikin haɗari da cututtukan numfashi ko kuma da haɗari ga ayyukan tsaro, suna da damar kamuwa da cutar fiye da sauran mutane.

Tsakani kamuwa da cuta da bayyanan alamar cutan (lokacin girma) na kwayar cutar SARS-CoV-2 na iya kasancewa tsakanin kwanaki 1-14, mafi rinjaye kwanaki 3-7 ne kamar yadda aka yi a cikin aikin farko 425 a Wuhan.
Amma, a cikin 1,099 masu kamuwa da cutar, lokacin girma ya kasance kwanaki 3 a cikin kwanaki 0 zuwa 24.
Babban labarin da ya gabata, kamar yadda aka bayyana a cikin wannan labarin, yana nuna cewa lokacin da aka yi aiki ya kasance 4.8 (3.0-7.2) na rana a kan demography na 8,866 lokuta.

Yana da muhimmanci sosai don hukumomin lafiya su canza lokacin kebe da ke aiki ta hanyar mafi kyawun lokacin kwayar cutar, don hana mutanen da suka kamu da kwayar cutar amma ba su da alamun cutar su yada kwayar cutar zuwa wasu.
A matsayin aiki, mutanen da ke cikin hulɗa da cutar ko da ke kamuwa da ita, ana keɓe su na kwanaki 14.
Za a kara waɗannan lokutan kebe zuwa awanni 24?

Duk da haka, babu wani matsala a cikin ci gaban rigakafi saboda lokacin da aka yi amfani da shi (ƙidayar shekaru 18) don ci gaban rigakafi da canjin yanayi na CoVs.
A matsayin cutar da ta fara faruwa, COVID-19 ya fara nuna babban lokacinsa na asibiti a cikin dabi'a daban-daban.
A yawancin lokutan, marasa lafiya za su iya samun ci gaban lafiya da kuma ci gaban lafiya.
Amma, kamar SARS da MERS, COVID-19 kuma yana da alaƙa da ci gaba da lafiya da mutuwa a cikin masu cutarwa.
Don haka, aikin gina tsarin bayyana bayyanar cutar don hukumomin kula da lafiya don bada fifiko a kan hidimtansu, musamman a yankunan da albarkatunsu ba su da yawa.
Kamar yadda aka bayyana a cikin bincike na asibiti da aka bayyana har zuwa yanzu, abubuwan da suka shafi ko suna da alaƙa da ci gaba na marasa lafiya na COVID-19 (Alƙalawa 33):
Shekara: Shekara ita ce mafi muhimmanci a cikin bayyana cewa SARS, wanda kuma ya daidaita COVID-19.
COVID-19 ya faru a cikin shekaru 30-65 tare da 47.7% na marasa lafiya da ke cikin shekaru 50 a cikin binciken 8,866 lokuta a cikin bayanin da aka yi.

Marasa lafiya waɗanda suka buƙaci garkuwan jiki suna da yanayin da ke cikin haɗari da matsaloli da kuma suna da shekaru daidai ko gaba da 66, wanda ke nuna shekara a matsayin abin da ke bayyana a matsayin abin da ke bayyana sakamakon marasa lafiyar COVID-19.
Jinsi: SARS-CoV-2 ya tabbatar da mutane da yawa kamar da mata (0.31/100,000 versus 0.27/100,000), kamar yadda aka bayyana a cikin wannan.
Rashin lafiya da haɗari: Masu cutar COVID-19 waɗanda ke buƙatar kulawa mai zurfi suna da alaƙa da haɗarin ciwon zuciya da kuma ƙarancin ƙarfi.
Kuma hanyoyin nuna lafiya na jikin jiki ne kawai sanadiyar mutuwa a cikin masu cutar SARS.

An bayyana cewa SARS-CoV-2 kuma zai iya rataya wa ACE2-positive cholangiocytes, wanda zai iya saɓaɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓuɓɓu
Yayin da yake nuna cewa tsufa da yanayin rashin lafiya suna da alaƙa da ƙarfi da sauran abubuwan da ke da alaƙa.

Abnormal laboratory findings: The C-reactive protein (CRP) level in blood reflects the severity of inflammation or tissue injury and has been proposed to be a potential prognostic factor for disease, response to therapy, and ultimate recovery.
Kuma an bayyana alaƙar matakan CRP zuwa tsananin da nuna COVID-19.
A cikin wannan lokacin, kuma, LDH, AST, ALT, da CK da ke cikin girma zasu iya taimakawa a cikin yanayin da ke faruwa.
Enzymes na iya bayyana a cikin sassa daban-daban na jiki, musamman a cikin jini da jini, kuma ana fitar da su a lokacin canji na ƙwayar cuta.
Don haka, su ne martani na asali don cututtukan zuciya ko cututtukan zuciya.
Alamun asibiti na musamman: Radiography na ciki da ci gaba na lokaci na alamun asibiti za a yi amfani da su tare da wasu abubuwan da ke da alaƙa da sakamako da ciwon COVID-19.
Amfani da steroid: Kamar yadda aka bayyana a cikin wannan rahoton, steroid na iya zubar da rigakafin cutar da kuma amfani da shi a matsayin maganin adadi na cuta don kawar da ciwon cutar.

Bayan cikakken amfani da corticosteroids a cikin cutar SARS mai tsanani, akwai yawan mutanen da suka tsira daga cutar da ke fama da osteonecrosis na avascular tare da nakasa na rayuwa da rayuwa mai tsada.
Haka nan, idan an gani, steroid na iya amfani da wani lokaci mai tsawo a COVID-19.

A cikin binciken jinsi da aka yi har yanzu, COVID-19 ya nuna alamun cututtukan SARS.

A cikin yadda ya dace, SARS-CoV-2 yana iya yin kwayar cuta a cikin kasa da kasa na hanyoyin numfashi, kuma yana iya yin kwayar cuta a cikin kasa da kasa na hanyoyin numfashi da ke haifar da matsaloli masu tsanani ko kuma ba su da matsala a farkon cutarwa, kamar yadda yake a cikin kwayar cutar da ke haifar da mura na yau da kullun.
Don haka, masu cutarwa a farkon lokaci ko lokacin rana suna samar da matsakaicin cutarwa a cikin ayyukan yau da kullun, wanda ke da matsala ga ragewar cutar.
Duk da haka, yaduwar SARS-CoV ana ganin zai faru ne a lokacin da mutane suke cikin cutar, yayin da yawancin yaduwar ba ta faruwa ba a lokacin farko.
Saboda haka, barkewar yau da kullun na COVID-19 ya fi girma da ya fi daidaita fiye da barkewar SARS.

Ira Longini, da sauran su, suka kafa tsarin da ya sa idan aka yi amfani da shi zai iya bayar da tsinkaya kan zafin cutar da aka yi amfani da shi, da ya bayyana cewa SARS-CoV-2 zai iya kamuwa da kashi biyu na mutanen duniya.

Tawagar Kanada ta bayyana cewa SARS-CoV-2 ana samunsa a cikin samfurin mid-turbinate da samfurin hanci na mutanen da suka samu nasarar samun lafiya da suka koma asibiti 2 kwanaki da suka gabata, wanda ke nuna cewa kwayar cutar da aka gano ta farko za ta zama wani lokaci mai tsayi kamar cututtukan influenza.
Amma bayyanar da ake buƙata ya faru a China kan ƙididdigar mafi girma na sababbin lokuta, wanda ya nuna cewa ayyukan da aka yi a yanzu na iya aiki.
Ebola ya kasance ana sa ran zai haifar da kusan mutane miliyan daya da kashi biyu na mutuwa.
Amma, ta hanyar keɓantattun keɓe da keɓewa, cutar ta yi nasara a tsawon lokaci.

Aidanta da cutar COVID-19 da cutar SARS da MERS a cikin jadawalin da ke zuwa (Fig. 55).
Kwayar cutar SARS-CoV-2 tana yaduwa sosai ta hanyar numfashi ko numfashi, da kuma kuma ta hanyar yanayin da ke da alaƙa da kayayyakin da ke da alaƙa da kwayar cutar.
Kuma an samu kwayar cutar a kashi, wanda ya sa yiwuwar yaduwa ta hanyar kashi–numfashi.

A cikin binciken da aka yi a cikin 138 masu cutar an bayyana cewa kashi 41% na masu cutar suna cikin yanayin da suka shafi cututtukan da aka yi a asibiti, ciki har da 17 masu cutar da cututtuka masu zuwa da kuma 40 masu kula da lafiya.
Don haka, masu lafiya, musamman masu kula da lafiya, masu aikin jama'a, abokan gida, abokan aiki, da kuma mutanen da suka tsira a cikin yanayin da suka hada da mutane ko masu auke da ita.

Farkon hanyar ajiye da za a yi amfani da ita don ragewa haɗarin kamuwa da cutar shine ta hanyar amfani da masu tsayin rai; amfani da masu tsayin rai masu aiki da N95 respirator masu tsayin rai (series # 1860s) ya taimaka wajen kare yaduwar cututtuka.
Abin Kariyar Fuska na iya cire saukowar numfashi daga mutumin da ke cikin yanayin cutar da ke tafiya ta hanyar ruwa ko kuma zama a cikin ababe, inda zai iya tafiya zuwa wasu.

Duk da haka, kawai masu siffar # 1860s na N95 za su tabbatar da cewa ba za a iya samun cututtukan da ke cikin 10 zuwa 80 nm, kuma kawai 5% na cututtukan da ke cikin 10 zuwa 80 nm za su iya shiga cikin kai tsaye; SARS-CoV-2 yana da girma kamar SARS-CoV kuma kowane duka ya kasance kusan 85 nm.

Kamar yadda aka bayyana a cikin wannan rubutu, cututtukan corona na mutum sun haɗa da HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1, cutar hanyoyin numfashi mai tsanani coronavirus (SARS-CoV), cutar numfashi na gefen larabawa coronavirus (MERS-CoV) da SARS-CoV-2.

Cutar SARS wacce ta faru a shekara 2003 ita ce daya daga cikin cututtukan da suka yi tasiri mafi girma a lokacin tarihi, wacce ta kamuwa da fiye da mutane 8,000 tare da adadin matsanancin masu cutar kusan kashi 10%.
A shekara guda goma bayan haka, barkewar cutar MERS ta haifar da barkewar cutar da ta ci gaba a gabas ta tsakiya tare da yawan tashin hankali zuwa cikin duniya.

Kwayar cutar 2019 novel HCoV (2019-nCoV), wacce aka sake sunanta zuwa SARS-CoV-2, ita ce sanadin barkewar annoba na cutar coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19), wacce ta kashe kimanin mutane 3,120 kuma ta kama kimanin mutane 91,000 a ranar 3 ga Maris, 2020.
Alamun ya faru da duniya ta yi shirya don yin pandemiyar SARS-CoV-2.
Kowane HCoV hudu suna da asalin zoonotic daga jemagu, beraye ko dabbobin gida.
Ƙayyadaddun bayanai suna taimakawa ga asalin juyin halitta na duk HCoVs daga jemagu, inda cututtukan suna da kyakkyawar tsari da kuma ba su da cutarwa amma suna da kyawun girmamawa.

SARS, wanda aka sani da "pneumonia mai tsanani", ya kasance pandemiyar farko da aka tabbatar da cewa ta HCoV-caused a tarihin mutane da cutar sanadin ita ce SARS-CoV, cutar coronavirus ta mutum ta uku da aka gano.
An samu farkon cutar SARS a karshen 2002 a jihar Guangdong na kasar China.
Annobar SARS ya haifar da 8,096 lokuta da aka ruwaito da kuma mutuwar mutane 774, wanda ya tashi zuwa kasashe da dama da duniya.

Lymphopenia, deranged liver function tests, and elevated creatine kinase are common laboratory abnormalities of SARS.
Alveolar diffuse damage, epithelial cell proliferation da ci gaban macrophages ana samu a cikin masu cutar SARS.

HCoV-NL63 an gano shi daga ɗan ƙaramin mutum na 7 daga ƙasar Netherlands a ƙarshen 2004.
An yi imanin cewa ya kasance mafi girma a cikin yara, masu shekaru, da masu lafiya da ke fama da cutar huhu.
Bayyanar coryza, conjunctivitis, zazzabi, da bronchiolitis shine mafi girma a cikin cutar da ke da alaƙa da HCoV-NL63.
Babban bincike na ƙarshe ya bayyana izinin ƙwayar da aka samo daga samfurori na hanci daga ɗan shekara 8 da ke fama da sanyi a netherlands.
Ko da yake an tabbatar da shi a Netherlands, amma shi ne ke yaduwa a duniya.
An ƙididdige cewa HCoV-NL63 ya haifar da kusan 4.7% na cututtukan numfashi masu yawa, kuma ƙididdigarsa ya fara farawa a cikin rana na farko na rana, rana da kuma yanayi.
HCoV-NL63 ana ƙididdige shi da ƙayyadaddun laryngitis, kuma an san shi da croup.
A shekarar da ta gabata, HCoV-HKU1 an ƙara daga ɗan adam mai shekaru 71 wanda ya kasance a cikin gidan yari da pneumonia da bronchiolitis a Hong Kong.
Cikin cututtukan hanyar numfashi da bronchiolitis, HCoV-HKU1 an bayyana cewa yana da alaƙa da cututtukan asthmatic acute.
Kamar HCoV-NL63, HCoV-229E da HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 an gano shi a duk duniya, yana haifar da cututtukan hanyoyin numfashi.

Ya zuwa Fabrairu 14, 2020, sama da 2500 lokuta masu tabbatar da gwajin sun bayyana tare da adadin mutuwa mai girma na 34.4%, wanda ya sa MERS-CoV ya zama daya daga cikin cututtukan mafi tasirin da aka sanin a cikin mutane.
A tsakanin watan Disamba zuwa watan Janairu 2019, an samu kungiyoyin masu cutar sanyi da ke cikin dangantaka da cutar SARS-CoV-2 a Wuhan, Hubei, China.

Kungiyar Lafiya ta Duniya ta ayyana annobar da ke faruwa a cikin hanyoyin numfashi na kasa da kasa wanda ke haifar da cutar SARS-CoV-2 a matsayin Kare lafiyar jama’a na gaggawa na duniya da kuma suna da suna COVID-19.
Ya zuwa Maris 3, 2020, an tabbatar da 90,053 lokuta a duniya, tare da 3.4% adadin mutuwa.
Kamar yadda, yawan matsanancin Hubei, China shine 4.2%, yayin da 1.2% shine a wajen ita.
SARS-CoV-2 ya haifar da cutar sankarau ta hankali kamar SARS-CoV da MERS-CoV, wanda aka bayyana a matsayin cuta, mura, da cutar sankarau.
Kuma cutar ruwan jini ana gani a wasu marasa lafiya.
Ciwon huhu ita ce mafi girman alamun da za a iya samu, kuma zai iya ci gaba cikin tsananin zuwa ciwo mai ratsa jiki.

a rana daya, dauke da cutar SARS-CoV-2 ya nuna alamun da ake samu a cikin cutar HCoVs da aka samu a cikin gida, ciki har da bayanan da ba a sani ba, karanci ko kuma ba a sani ba.

A ƙarshe, ƙimar haɓakawa na SARS-CoV-2 a ƙarƙashin ƙimar haɓakawa na HCoVs na ƙasa.
Duk da haka, bai tabbatar ba cewa yaduwar SARS-CoV-2 za ta ragu bayan yin yaki a cikin ɗan adam kamar a cikin ƙayyadun SARS-CoV da MERS-CoV.
Kuma, kamar sauran HCoVs, SARS-CoV-2 za a iya samunsa a cikin samfuran ruwa.
Ba a tabbatar cewa kamuwa da cutar SARS-CoV-2 a cikin jini ya kasance mai mahimmanci ba kamar yadda a cikin cutar SARS-CoV a wani lokaci.
Kuma yana da kyau ne don tabbatar da cewa SARS-CoV-2 zai nufi a lokacin rana kamar yadda a cikin cututtukan da aka samu a cikin jama'a.
Ba da daɗewa ba, bayyanar SARS-CoV-2 ciki har da yaduwar, pathogenicity da yaduwar da ke ci gaba a cikin ɗan adam za su kasance masu tasiri akan nasarar daidaitaccen cutar COVID-19.

Kamar yadda aka bayyana a cikin 7 (Maris 3, 2020), don tabbatar da lamuran da ake tsammanin ya kamata a ƙididdige ɗaya daga cikin abubuwan tarihi na epidemiological tare da biyan ɗaya daga cikin abubuwan bayyanar lafiya don yin bayyana, ko kuma ya kamata a cikin bayyana biyu na bayyanar lafiya idan ba a tabbatar da tarihi na epidemiological ba.

Tarihin epidemiology: (1) tarihin tafiya ko rayuwa a birnin Wuhan da yanki mafi girma, ko jama'a da aka bayar da rahoton COVID-19 a cikin watanni 14 kafin shiga; (2) tarihin hada jiki da cutar SARS-CoV-2 (tare da gwajin acid nucleic daidaituwa); (3) tarihin hada jiki da marasa lafiya ko cututtuka na hanyoyin numfashi daga birnin Wuhan da yanki mafi girma, ko jama'a da aka bayar da rahoton COVID-19 a cikin watanni 14 kafin shiga; (4) tarihin hada jiki da kungiyar marasa lafiya masu tabbatarwa (≥ 2 marasa lafiya masu tabbatarwa da cututtuka da/ko cututtuka na hanyoyin numfashi ya faru a cikin 2 weeks a cikin yanki mafi girma, kamar gida, asibiti, class na makaranta, da sauransu).
Alamun asibiti: (1) jini da/ko alamun numfashi; (2) tare da bayyane na COVID-19; (3) adadin kwayoyin halitta da ke nuna daidaituwa, raguwa ko raguwar adadin kwayoyin halitta a lokacin farko.

Bangladesh ya bayyana mutane biyu da suka mutu sakamakon COVID-19, mafi girma na rana
A ranar da ta gabata, Bangladesh ya tabbatar da mutuwar mutane biyu saboda COVID-19 a ranar.
Wannan ita ce mafi girman girman mutanen da suka mutu a rana saboda cutar.

A ranar da ta gabata, Bangladash's Institute of Epidemiology, Disease Control and Research (IEDCR) ya bayyana jimillar masu kamuwa da cutar da aka kiyasta sun hada da 114 masu kamuwa da cutar da ke aiki da kuma 33 masu dawowa da ke zaune a gida.
Jimlar mutuwar 17 ne suka tabbata.
A taron labarai na online, shugaban IEDCR, Dr. Meerjady Sabrina Flora, ya ce mutanen da suka mutu sun hada da mutane hudu da mace daya.
Kamar yadda Dr. Meerjady ya ce, biyu sun kasance a cikin shekaru 60, biyu tsakanin 51 da 60, da ɗaya 41-50 shekaru.
Kuma ta ce biyu daga cikin mutanen da suka shafi sun fito daga Dhaka.
Kungiyar Lafiya ta Duniya (WHO) ta ayyana COVID-19 a matsayin annoba a ranar 11 ga Maris.

A ranar Laraba, a sanarwar video ta online, ministan Bangladeshi na Road Transport da Bridges Obaidul Quader ya ce zirga-zirgar jama'a za a tsare don tsawon lokaci da aka sani, har zuwa ranar Laraba da ke zuwa.
An fara rufe hanyar jirgin kasa ta jama'a a ranar 26 ga Maris kuma an shirya ta ƙare a ranar Lahadi, 4 ga Afrilu.
Tsarkakar abubuwan da ake buƙata -- kiwon lafiya, mai, dama abinci -- an tabbata.

Annobar cutar coronavirus na shekarar 2019-20 cutar coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19), wacce ta haifar da cutar sankarau ta acute severe respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

Annobar an tabbatar da shi a wuhan, china, a watan Disamba 2019, an sanar da shi a matsayin Annoba ta Lafiya ta Jama'a ta Duniya a ranar 30 ga watan Janairu 2020, kuma an sanar da shi a matsayin annoba a ranar 11 ga watan Maris 2020.
Ya zuwa 10 ga Afrilu 2020, kusan 1.61 miliyan lokuta na COVID-19 sun bayyana a 210 kasashe da yanki, wanda ya haifar da kusan 97,000 mutuwa.
Fiye da mutane 364,000 ne suka fita daga cutar.

A cikin Amurka, masu samar da naurar iskar NIOSH-approved N95 filtering facepiece respirators ko da yawa dole ne su aika a cikin yanayin shirin kulawar cututtukan fata da aka rubuta wanda ya haɗa da fit-testing, horarwa, da nazarin lafiya.

Wasu nau'ikan rufe fuska na iya bayar da kariya mai yawa da kuma karɓar lafiyar aiki. WHO ba ta bayar da shawarar amfani da coveralls ba, saboda cutar COVID-19 ta kasance cuta ta hanyar hawan jiki kamar yadda ake yi da kashi.
WHO ta shawarci cikin abin Sanya Kariyar Fuska na asibiti don mutanen da suke aiki a kan hanyar shiga.

Ga waɗanda ke samun abubuwan da suka shafi jikin jiki daga, kula da, ko aikawa COVID-19 na mutane ba tare da aikace-aikace masu haɗa jiki ba, WHO ta bayar da shawarar rufe fuska, goggo, ko kaya, babban kaya, da gora.
Idan aikin samar da aerosol ana yi, masu samar da N95 ko FFP2 respirator ana ɗaukarsu a matsayin abin rufe fuska.

ACE yana kunna angiotensin I hormone zuwa angiotensin II.

ACE2 a cikin daidaitaccen karɓar enzyme Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe daga angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) da hydrolyses shi cikin vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
ACE2 kuma zai iya ƙarɓar ƙwayoyin da dama ciki har da [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, da ghrelin.
ACE2 kuma ya shigar da hanyar jirgin ruwa na transporter amino acid neutral SLC6A19 kuma an yi la'akari da shi a cikin Hartnup's disease.

A matsayin protein na transmembrane, ACE2 yana aiki a matsayin babban hanyar shiga cikin ƙwayoyin mutum don wasu coronaviruses, ciki har da HCOV NL63; SARS COV (cutar SARS); da SARS COV 2 (cutar COVID-19).

A cikin saƙon daidaituwa, rataya na protein na S1 na spike na SARS-CoV da SARS-CoV2 zuwa yanki na enzymatic na ACE2 akan layin ƙwayoyin mutum ya haifar da endocytosis da translocation na kwayar cuta da enzyme zuwa endosomes da ke cikin ƙwayoyin.

Yawan shiga wannan hanyar kuma yana buƙatar priming na S protein ta hanyar mai garkuwar serine protease TMPRSS2, wanda ya kasance a cikin bincike na yanzu a matsayin maganin da za a iya amfani da shi. Wannan ya haifar da wasu su yi hasashen cewa kawar da ƙimar ACE2, a cikin kwayar, zai taimaka wajen yaki da kamuwa da cutar.
Duk da haka, akwai wasu kungiyoyi masu aiki da hukumomin da suka amince da ci gaba da aikin ACE da ARB.

A cikin bincike da meta-analysis da aka buga a ranar 11 ga watan Yuli 2012, an tabbatar cewa "amfani da ACE inhibitors ya kasance da alaka da ragin 34% na haɗarin cutar kwaƙwalwa fiye da masu kula da shi."
Kuma, "hadarin pneumonia kuma ya ragu a cikin masu cutar ACE da aka yi amfani da su waɗanda ke cikin ƙarancin pneumonia, musamman waɗanda ke cikin cutar zafi da ciwon zuciya.
Amfani da ACE inhibitors kuma an jera da shi da ragewa a cikin mutanen da suka mutu sakamakon cutar huhu, amma sakamakon ba su da inganci kamar yadda ake buƙata.

ACE2 na mutum (rhACE2) an tabbatar cewa shi ne aikace-aikace a cikin cutar hanyoyin numfashi mai tsanani, kuma ya bayyana cewa ya karɓi hanyoyin numfashi da gurɓatar oxygen a cikin piglets da aka yi amfani da su a cikin cutar hanyoyin numfashi mai tsanani.

97.5% na mutanen da suka samu alamun cutar suke fitowa cikin kwanaki 11.5 bayan kamuwa da cutar. Bayanai sun nuna cewa ba kowane wanda ya kamu da cutar ya samu alamun cutar.
